column1: * 1907 - Translator Ebba-Margareta von Freymann is born.
* 1937 - Wikipedia:Arthur Ransome writes Letter to Arthur Ransome.
* 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Rayner Heppenstall (13 December 1954).
* 1967 - Margaret Carroux comes to meet J.R.R. Tolkien in Oxford to talk about her German translation.
* 2012 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in Europe.
* 2013 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug is released.
* 2013 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Art & Design is published.
